products.name: IPad 8
products.description: The eighth-generation iPad (officially the iPad 10.2-inch, marketed as iPad) is a tablet computer developed and marketed by Apple Inc. as the successor to the 7th-generation iPad. It features the same 10.2-inch Retina display as its predecessor, with the SoC upgraded to the Apple A12 Bionic processor, making it 40% faster according to Apple.

products.name: Samsung Galaxy Tab S7
products.description: The Samsung Galaxy Tab S7 and Galaxy Tab S7+ are Android-based tablets designed, developed, and marketed by Samsung Electronics.

products.name: MacBook Air M1
products.description: On November 10, 2020, Apple announced an updated MacBook Air with an Apple-designed M1 processor, launched alongside an updated Mac Mini and 13-inch MacBook Pro as the first Macs with Apple"s new line of custom ARM-based Apple silicon processors.

products.name: Apple iPad Air (2020)
products.description: The fourth-generation iPad Air gives you the power of an iPad Pro for less money, making it the best Apple tablet to buy in 2020.

item.name: MacBook Air M1
item.description: On November 10, 2020, Apple announced an updated MacBook Air with an Apple-designed M1 processor, launched alongside an updated Mac Mini and 13-inch MacBook Pro as the first Macs with Apple"s new line of custom ARM-based Apple silicon processors.

item.name: Samsung Galaxy Tab S7
item.description: The Samsung Galaxy Tab S7 and Galaxy Tab S7+ are Android-based tablets designed, developed, and marketed by Samsung Electronics.
